steps.title: insights
steps.subtitle: pastoral livelihoods & climate change in ethiopia
steps.content:
Major changes in rainfall patterns in pastoral areas are undermining pastoralism as a viable livelihood strategy.

Pastoralists are particularly vulnerable because of high levels of health stress and low levels of literacy and information access, particularly among women.
